# GET /v1/subscriptionGroups/{id}/relationships/subscriptions | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptionGroups/{id}/relationships/subscriptions ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionGroups-_id_-relationships-subscriptions)

-  GET /v1/subscriptionGroups/{id}/relationships/subscriptions 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptionGroups/{id}/relationships/subscriptions

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionGroups-_id_-relationships-subscriptions#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptionGroups/{id}/relationships/subscriptions
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionGroups-_id_-relationships-subscriptions#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionGroups-_id_-relationships-subscriptions#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionGroups-_id_-relationships-subscriptions#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionGroupSubscriptionsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptiongroupsubscriptionslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionGroups-_id_-relationships-subscriptions#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionGroups-_id_-relationships-subscriptions#Endpoints)

[`Create a Subscription Group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptiongroups)Create a subscription group for an app.[`List All Subscription Groups for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-subscriptiongroups)Get a list of subscription groups for a specific app.[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/subscriptionGroups`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-subscriptiongroups)[`Read Subscription Group Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptiongroups-_id_)Get the details of a specific subscription group.[`Modify a Subscription Group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-subscriptiongroups-_id_)Update the reference name for a specific subscription group.[`Delete a Subscription Group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-subscriptiongroups-_id_)Delete a specific empty subscription group.[`List All Subscription Group Localizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptiongroups-_id_-subscriptiongrouplocalizations)Get a list of all localized metadata for a specific subscription group.[`GET /v1/subscriptionGroups/{id}/relationships/subscriptionGroupLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptiongroups-_id_-relationships-subscriptiongrouplocalizations)[`List All Subscriptions for a Subscription Group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptiongroups-_id_-subscriptions)Get a list of all auto-renewable subscriptions in a subscription group.
